author: Mariana Alfaro
title: Midterm primaries live updates Voters to pick key nominees in Pa., N.C., three other states

sentence: We need to get as high on that hierarchy as we can while still winning: Radical MAGA King (Think Trump, Ron DeSantis, Mike Lee, Ted Cruz) Normal Republican (Think Murder Turtle and those interchangeable suits who always vote right) Annoying RINO (Think Mitt Romney or Lindsey Graham or Oz) Jeb!
author: Kurt Schlichter
title: Conservatives, Stop Falling in Love with Politicians

sentence: Thats clear not only from the results of the primary contests thus far but also from the talking points and battle cries beyond them from, for example, the governors mansion in Florida, where Ron DeSantis plots and executes his plan for emerging as the new leader of the Republican Party.
title: David Graham pondered
